name: Ball Arena 3D
description:
Based on the "Roll-A-Ball" tutorial by Unity. The game is still WIP, so it definitely needs alot of work. I will make updates soon with new levels, mechanics, level unlock system and bug fixes! The game is also compatible with Android and iOS and once done, i'll upload it to Google Play store.

Soundtrack by Jamie Nord: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX4SQvYS3mX-pGoix...

Other sounds are from www.freesound.org, by: ProjectsU012, LittleRobotSoundFactory, suntemple & killkhan.
